item.title: Statistics and Probability
item.description: Concepts Identifying individuals, variables and categorical variables in data Name Age Gender Survived Ab 27 Male Yes Em 24 Female Yes Pm 48 Female Yes Ro 99 Male No Lm 72 Female No Here if we are asked which ones are individuals and how many variables are there and which variables are categorical.
